DOC.brief_title: Dynamic Hyperinflation During Maximal Voluntary Ventilation Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Maximal voluntary ventilation ( MVV ) correlate well maximal exercise capacity use assess ventilatory function exercise COPD ( Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ) patient . Dynamic hyperinflation ( DH ) often occur MVV COPD believe due expiratory flow limitation . The present study intend assess whether DH also occur MVV normal subject without expiratory flow limitation . Study design : healthy subject normal lung function perform MVV increase breathe frequency maximal tidal volume , 10 100 cycle per minute . Inspiratory capacity ( IC ) measure rest 12 second MVV order detect DH . From moment DH appear give frequency , one additional MVV high breathing frequency conduct confirm DH .
